an10.80:1.3: ‘Anatthaṁ me acari, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti,
an10.80:1.4: ‘anatthaṁ me carati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti,
an10.80:1.5: ‘anatthaṁ me carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṁ paṭivineti,
an10.80:1.8: carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhāti āghātaṁ paṭivineti, appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṁ acari …pe…
an10.80:1.10: atthaṁ carissati, taṁ kutettha labbhāti āghātaṁ paṭivineti,
